item.title: January/February Recap
item.description: This month was all about catching up on Albums that I missed in the 2010’s and I liked this so much that I decided to start trying to write a review a day…. Well, that fell off, BUT it its places rises the Monthly Recap! A Place where I can talk about my thoughts on the month as a whole and give out some awards a long the way. Because you know what all these artists need is validation from a random guy on the internet.
